title: Rēzekne's mayor suspended after not getting security clearance
summary_full: Raimonds Čudars (New Unity), Minister of Smart Administration and Regional Development, has issued an order suspending Aleksandrs Bartaševičs (Together for Latvia), Chairman of the Rēzekne City Council, LSM's Latgale editorial reports.
